nodes.text: Doctor Vin Emil was one of the original University of Sanbra scientists at the Q'Maere Research Facility, and the station's xenobotanist. Moff Kentor Sarne offered him a position at the facility when he converted it to a prison, and Emil accepted. During his time at the facility, he created Variant Alpha, an antidote to the strange bacteria mutation found in the Kathol Rift.
